notes: Newborn care, neonatal sepsis and pneumonia
All HIV interventions including STI treatment
Vaccines prevent measles, diphtheria, whooping cough, tetanus
CVD prevention, IHD, stroke prevention, CHF, PVD
Acute coronary syndromes, acute heart failure
GI bleeding (can be related to CVD medications)
Liver cancer from Hep B/C (implied in screening)
Rheumatic heart disease from strep infections
Substance use: AUD screening, OAT, tobacco cessation
Trauma surgery: fractures, head injury, thoracoabdominal, burns
Childhood cancers (ALL, Burkitt, Hodgkin, Wilms), breast screening, colorectal screening
Anxiety, depression, PTSD, bipolar, psychosis, epilepsy
Appendicitis, hernias, gallbladder disease, intestinal obstruction
